name: GOTTA STACK
description:
You and your comrades have been captured by a claw game. By sacrificing some of them, you might be able to find Larry.

How you and your comrades got captured by a claw game? You formed a long chain with your combined bodies to try to grab the legendary Ms. Larry figurine when the only person on the outside sneezed and dropped all of you in the machine.

Stack and crash your way through 6 buggy levels as you search the machine for Ms. Larry.

Controls

  • A and D to move.
  • Space to reset.
  • TAB to stack - you might have to press it a few times to get it to work.
  • R to release from the spawn platform.
